title: Microstrategy to Buy More Bitcoin With Proceeds From $600M Convertible Note Sale
description: Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy is planning to sell $600 million in convertible senior notes and use some of the proceeds to buy additional bitcoin. Microstrategy now holds 193K bitcoin.
